alert.note: Alert for Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 6:06PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Lawrence and southeastern Crook Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 606 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles north of Moskee, or 9 miles southeast of Sundance, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea to penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cement Ridge Lookout around 615 PM MDT. Iron Creek Lake and Roughlock Falls around 625 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Crow Peak, Spearfish Canyon and Savoy. This includes... Interstate 90 in South Dakota near Mile Marker 1. Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 206 and 207. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills
